channel.title: UN building - the center of Potent
channel.description:
[center][size=14pt]In the center of world 2 sits a tall tower, used by non other than the members of potent. The tower is there to unify all of these nations into one.[/size][/center]
[center][IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/2gwtibl.png[/img][/center]
Currently available from the tower is rooms, as the tower is 16 floors high, 14 of them available, completely FREE for whatever you want to do with them. The only exception is you fill out an application below and that you are approved.
You can become a member of Potent by pressing the potent thread, found in Moparcraft discussion
You can find the tower toward the coordinates of 0,0
[u][b]Application:[/u]
Minecraft name:
What area of Potent are you from:
What floor do you want:
Why/For what purpose?[/b]
Floor status:
16 - Taken for meeting room 15 - Agl's House of Fried Cocks 14 - Drub's escape 13 - Tom's support area 12 - Open! 11 - Open! 10 - Open! 9 - Open! 8 - Nokturth's Bakery or something 7 - Open! 6 - Open! 5 - Open! 4 - Open! 3 - Open! 2 - Varrock II HQ 1 - The lobby

item.title: UN building - the center of Potent
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote="(Anthony), post:14, topic:419327"]Minecraft name: bool

What area of Potent are you from: The Mountain Goats

What floor do you want: 3

Why/For what purpose? A place for me to put free supplies for all of Potent members to use (wood, melons, wheat, sand, coal, redstone).[/quote]

Accepted

Read full topic
item.source: UN building - the center of Potent

item.title: UN building - the center of Potent
item.dc:creator: @_bool
item.description:
@_bool wrote:

Minecraft name: bool

What area of Potent are you from: The Mountain Goats

What floor do you want: 3

Why/For what purpose? A place for me to put free supplies for all of Potent members to use (wood, melons, wheat, sand, coal, redstone).

Read full topic
item.source: UN building - the center of Potent

item.title: UN building - the center of Potent
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“drubrkletern, post:10, topic:419327”]Inb4 someone builds a huge airplane and gets arab skin.

Anyways…

Minecraft name: Jrubrkletern

What area of Potent are you from: The mountain goats

What floor do you want: Highest floor possible

Why? Well, mainly as a back up home to retreat from, but also to store emergency supplies, and to hide in any case of emergency.[/quote]

Accepted for floor 14!

[quote=“Tom_BETA, post:12, topic:419327”]Minecraft name: Tom5001

What area of Potent are you from: Foundation

What floor do you want: 13/14 (higher the better)

Why/For what purpose? I feel it appropriate to get a floor for official potent matters, I’ve picked a high floor so I can see for all around which will be handy because this floor is dedicated to the security of potent members.

The general idea that this office will contribute to is giving members of potent important intelligence on matters that might concern them (such as an attacker, or looter within their area). Also, information about the capabilities and plans of our enemies!

I could go on but I think you get the idea :P[/quote]

Accepted for floor 13!

Read full topic
item.source: UN building - the center of Potent

item.title: UN building - the center of Potent
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Minecraft name: Tom5001

What area of Potent are you from: Foundation

What floor do you want: 13/14 (higher the better)

Why/For what purpose? I feel it appropriate to get a floor for official potent matters, I’ve picked a high floor so I can see for all around which will be handy because this floor is dedicated to the security of potent members.

The general idea that this office will contribute to is giving members of potent important intelligence on matters that might concern them (such as an attacker, or looter within their area). Also, information about the capabilities and plans of our enemies!

I could go on but I think you get the idea

Read full topic

item.title: UN building - the center of Potent
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

[quote=“LilXCj, post:8, topic:419327”]Minecraft name: Ituharu

What area of Potent are you from: Varrock II

What floor do you want: 2

Why/For what purpose? Varrock informational office and general store. All applicants to join Varrock apply here and buy any supplies provided by Varrock on this level as well. Varrock HQ.[/quote]

Very nice, approved!

Read full topic

What floor do you want: 8

Why/For what purpose?: bakery or some kind of business is ok? xD
[/quote]

Approved! Just build whenever you chose, and I recommend something similar to Agl’s floor format, you’ll find it 7 floors over yours.[/quote]

it’s a nice format, i’ll do that

[center][size=14pt]In the center of world 2 sits a tall tower, used by non other than the members of potent. The tower is there to unify all of these nations into one.[/size][/center]

Currently available from the tower is rooms, as the tower is 16 floors high, 14 of them available, completely FREE for whatever you want to do with them. The only exception is you fill out an application below and that you are approved.

You can become a member of Potent by pressing the potent thread, found in Moparcraft discussion

You can find the tower toward the coordinates of 0,0
